title: Im having an issue
body: I got 2 dodge timers because your game is glitched out, how is this my fault. It didn't show the champs I can pick or ban, so it kicks me out and gives me a dodge timer. Almost an hour of my time wasted, and I cant wait all day to play only one game.

replies.body:
Hmmmm it sounds like your network was able to put you in the lobby, but wasn't able to get a solid connection in order to find out what champions you own. Since the client couldn't figure out who you were able to pick from, it couldn't display any champs and then you timed out. 

Before your hop back in the queue, make sure you check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) while paying close attention to port forwarding and flushing your DNS. Test the steps in that guide out in a custom game, and let me know how it goes.
